nodes.text: A sterilization pill was a type of pill used to make water safe to drink. In 3 ABY, the Rebel Alliance soldiers Brand and Hazram Namir used sterilization pills when filling their canteens at a creek on the jungle planet Coyerti. The process reminded the pair of their time on the terrestrial body Kor-Lahvan in 0 BBY.
Sterilization pills appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
